title: Country Salary Calculators | International Tax Calculators | SalaryWise.io
description: Calculate take-home pay for different countries with localized tax rules. Compare salaries across the US, UK, Canada, Australia, and more.
keywords: country salary calculator, international tax calculator, global salary comparison, localized tax rules

header.title: Country Salary Calculators
header.subtitle: Calculate take-home pay with local tax rules

intro.paragraph1: Understanding your take-home pay varies significantly by country due to different tax systems, social contributions, and local regulations. Our country-specific calculators help you understand your net income anywhere in the world.
intro.paragraph2: Select your country below to get accurate salary calculations based on local tax laws and regulations.

countries.name: Australia

countries.name: Ireland

countries.name: India
countries.description: Income tax, professional tax, provident fund contributions
